sentence.Network_en: The small courtesies sweeten life; the greater ennoble it.
sentence.Network_cn: 有点礼貌使生活愉快, 多点礼貌使生活高尚.

sentence.Network_en: Ennoble a prime minister for distinguished service.
sentence.Network_cn: 因其杰出的功劳授予总理爵位.

sentence.Network_en: The total effect of Aristofie's thought is to ennoble humanity and to increase personal responsibility.
sentence.Network_cn: 从总的效果来看,亚里士多德思想是要使人变得高尚,是要增加个人的责任.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... endear 使受喜爱 ennoble 使成贵族，使高贵 encipher 译成密码.
gre词汇精选（最新词汇） - 豆丁网 ... encyclopedic 广博的，知识渊博的 ennoble 授予爵位，使高贵 enshrine 奉为神圣.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 - 外国语 -... ... enneode 电子管 ennoble 封为贵族 ennui 倦怠.
蓝宝词典 ... enmity n. 敌意 ennoble vt. 授予爵位；使尊贵 ennui n.v. 倦怠；厌倦.

list.abs: study of the protective effect of salvia miltiorrhiza ennoblement for enteral nutrition on intestinal mucosa in mods model rats .丹参强化肠内营养对大鼠多器官功能障碍保护作用的研究。
British queen to ennoble Greenspan as Honorary Knight ., 英女王将颁授葛林斯潘荣誉骑士爵位.

list.exp: 艰苦的工作使人精神变得高尚
list.abs: 6. Hard work ennobles human spirit.  艰苦的工作使人精神变得高尚。  -- 来源 -- 英汉 - 短句参考好评(0) 差评(0)  7. Hunger can have a.
impact the values needed by leaders and managers to motivate , inspire and ennoble their people .公司的领导者和管理者去激励，启发和奖励员工的价值。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (formerly also as innoble): from French ennoblir, from en- (expressing a change of state) + noble 'noble'

entry.def: To ennoble someone or something means to make them more dignified and morally better.

example.ex: ...the enduring fundamental principles of life that ennoble mankind.
example.tran: 使人类彰显高尚的经久不衰的人生基本准则

entry.def: If someone is ennobled, they are made a member of the nobility.

example.ex: ...the son of a financier who had been ennobled.
example.tran: 被封为贵族的金融家之子
新近被封为贵族的阿彻男爵

means.word_mean: 2. give a title to someone; make someone a member of the nobility

auth_sentence.content: So anything I can do to ennoble beer is worthwhile, whether dressing up the packaging or dressing up for a beer dinner.
auth_sentence.res_content: So anything I can do to ennoble beer is worthwhile, whether dressing up the packaging or dressing up for a beer dinner.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So anything I can do to ennoble beer is worthwhile, whether dressing up the packaging or dressing up for a beer dinner.
